DOC.brief_summary: The study objective investigate efficacy safety p53 combine chemotherapy ( cisplatin paclitaxel ) treatment recurrent Ovarian Epithelial Cancer , Fallopian Tube Cancer , Primary Peritoneal Cancer .
DOC.brief_title: p53 Gene Treatment Recurrent Ovarian Epithelial Cancer , Fallopian Tube Cancer , Primary Peritoneal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The study objective investigate efficacy safety p53 combine chemotherapy ( cisplatin paclitaxel ) treatment recurrent Ovarian Epithelial Cancer , Fallopian Tube Cancer , Primary Peritoneal Cancer . study design : open-labeled , active control , randomize , phase 2 treatment : experiment group consist intraperitoneal p53 ( 2 x 10^12 viral particle ) plus cisplatin 150 mg/m^2 , Paclitaxel 175 mg/m^2 IV 3 h day 1 ; every 21 6 cycle . study end point : response rate , progression-free survival , overall survival Karnofsky scoreï¼ˆKPS ) .
DOC.criteria: 1. histopathologically diagnosed ovarian epithelial cancer , fallopian tube cancer , primary peritoneal cancer 2. recurrent 3 . 18 year old 4. normal test hemogram , blood coagulation , liver kidney function 5. sign inform consent form . 1 . Serious blood coagulation disorder , bleed tendency , platelet < 6 * 1000000000/L ; 2. serious heart , lung function abnormality severe diabetes patient ; 3. active infection ; 4. severe atherosclerosis ; 5 . AIDS patient ; 6. serious thrombotic embolic event within 6 month ; 7. renal insufficiency require hemodialysis peritoneal dialysis ; 8. pregnant lactate woman ; 9. mental disorder disease .
